title: [W]Respondent contest claim
p1: [W]This is your response to the claimant’s claim. You should refer to the ET1 claim form in your response.
p2: [W]Tell us what happened in your own words. You do not need to use formal legal language.
bullet1: [W]setting out the aspects of the claim you agree or disagree with, including if you’re contesting only part of the claim
bullet2: [W]making sure that any facts or events are in date order
bullet3: [W]whether you think another person or company may be liable and why
p3: [W]You can use the text box or upload a file containing the details of your response.
p4: [W]Each file should be a maximum of 50MB in size (larger files must be split).

fileUploadTable.hint:
[W]

You can upload multiple documents.

If you want to upload an email, download and convert from your email client first. Most email clients will give the option of downloading as pdf or PostScript.

fileUpload.linkText: [W]Or upload your summary as a separate document (optional)

acceptedFormats.label: [W]Accepted formats
acceptedFormats.p1: [W]Accepted file formats are pdf, doc, docx, txt, dot, jpg, jpeg, bmp, tif, tiff, png, xls, xlt, xla, xlsx, xltx, ppt, pot, pps, ppa, pptx, potx, ppsx, rtf, csv.
